original_title: Striking railway workers given deadline to report to duty
original_body_lines: The General Manager of Sri Lanka Railways has warned that all Station Masters and Railway Controllers who fail to report to duty by 12.00 noon today (10) will be considered as having vacated their positions.
Accordingly, all the striking Railway Station Masters and Railway Controllers are instructed to report for duty at their respective railway stations or at least to the nearest railway station.
